animate.description: Determines whether Skeleton should be animated, true by default
animate.description_zh: 确定是否应为 Skeleton 设置动画，默认为 true

circle.description: If set, Skeleton width and border-radius are equal to its height, false by default
circle.description_zh: 如果设置，则 Skeleton width 和 border-radius 等于其高度，默认为 false

height.description: Skeleton height, numbers are converted to rem, auto by default
height.description_zh: 骨架高度，数字默认转换为 rem、auto

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius. Numbers are converted to rem. theme.defaultRadius by default.
radius.description_zh: key） 或任何用于设置 border-radius 的有效 CSS 值。默认情况下，数字会转换为 rem. theme.defaultRadius。

visible.description: Determines whether Skeleton overlay should be displayed, true by default
visible.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 Skeleton overlay（骨架叠加层），默认为 true

width.description: Skeleton width, numbers are converted to rem, 100% by default, ignored when circle prop is set
width.description_zh: 骨架宽度，数字转换为 rem，默认为 100%，设置 circle 属性时忽略
